title: Five bodies found in China township hospital fire
text:
Xinhua | Updated: 2019-10-09 11:31

HEFEI - Five people were found dead early Wednesday morning in a fire at a township hospital in East China's Anhui province, local police said.

The fire broke out at about 2 am at a township health center in Guoyang county in the city of Bozhou, the county public security bureau said in a press release.

Fire fighters have put out the fire and found five bodies at the scene.

It is not immediately known if the five, whose identities also remained unknown, were killed because of the fire.

An investigation into the cause of the fire is under way.
description: HEFEI  - Five people were found dead early Wednesday morning in a fire at a township hospital in East China's Anhui province, local police said.
